website_summaries.verdict: Adidas puts up with the challenge of creating a women-friendly golf shoe, accounting for both fashion and performance and fusing them in one shoe. It covers comfort, traction, and water protection. More than that, players are very appreciative of the interesting style twists that are injected on this product.
pros: A high number of users guarantee that the Adidas Adipure DC provides cloud-like comfort that lasts throughout the entire round
Several reviewers assure that this Adidas golf shoe is waterproof
Playing through flooded areas with the foot staying dry becomes possible with this trainer
Some of the players were initially intimidated by the metallic side accent
But it turns out to be an interesting detailing that brings life to its overall look
Since the interior is lined, it can be worn with or without socks, says one lady golfer
The spikes not only give adequate traction, but they are also easy to maintain and clean, according to a few individuals
One says that the roomy toe box prevents constricting of the foot, especially when performing a swing
A golfer states that the supportive base provides balance like no other
cons: One says that breaking in is a necessity for this model

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think , just buy now
customer_reviews.text: Love theee shoes. Did a full review of them at sconnieigirl.com They are truly waterproof played on a flooded course and my feet stayed dry the entire time. The inside is lined so you can wear socks or no socks. Spikes are super easy to clean and I love that the classic adidas lines are gold dots!
customer_reviews.author: Sconniegirl ( sconniegirldotcom)

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, look great .get tons of compliments on them ..and are great when the grass is wet...Wonderful buy..
customer_reviews.author: Sandrella

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort! Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are outstanding, walked 18 holes right out of the box. Really love them so ordering another pair for when they wear out. They were delivered a couple of days before I expected them. Gold metal tips on the end of the shoelaces as well as the side of shoe, even gold cleats, super cute. Sheryl
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a black pair of golf shoes.. easier said than done since im picky. I love these golf shoes. Comfortable, roomy toe box, nice patent tips and patent on heels, accents of gold on Adidas stripes, laces and spikes. Cloud like comfort so you’re not thinking about your feet when your golfing. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: cas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Photo and description were spot on. Super comfortable but supportive. Been wearing white golf shoes since I started playing and they get dirty so quick that I decided to switch to black, which makes more sense. Was afraid the gold would be too blingy but it wasn't. Fit was perfect. I have a narrow foot and am a pretty true 8. I would definitely but again. Only regret is that I thought I would try the Locker pick up at a 7-11. Ended up in traffic and got a candy bar I didn't need. Didn't save me any money or time..lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: I get tons of compliments on these shoes EVERY time ...
customer_reviews.text: I get tons of compliments on these shoes EVERY time I golf. They are by far the cutest golf shoes I've seen this season and their comfort is off the charts. Would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable and have a lot of support. The shipping was really fast and came in the box and everything, I was very impressed for the price. They look at little bit like clown shoes to me but I still really like them because they are so comfortable. All and all I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily I.

customer_reviews.title: They looked really good on her but then she makes most everything look ...
customer_reviews.text: My Wife likes the look and her feet were not too tired after walking 18 holes. They looked really good on her but then she makes most everything look good that she wears!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: these shoes kept my feet dry and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I did buy a half size down, because there was 1 pair left, I figured, why not..these shoes are very comfortable and kept my feet dry, the most important part ...they are stylish looking too..very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: LadyBags

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort and at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: A bought these as inexpensive backup shoes to keep in my office for those days I want to hit the driving range after work. I really like these, they may end up being my regular playing shoes. Good comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Wu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Black golf shoes with cleats are hard to find. I like the Adidas brand and these have more support than the very popular sneaker-like golf shoes. Fit is true to size. Very comfortable, reasonably water-resistant. I particularly like the gold spikes and the gold dots on the side.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Classy comfortable golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for it's classy black and gold trim, but after wearing it, I found the fit to be perfect and the comfort good. I have only worn them once for 9 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Julia D. Kirwan

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit was as expected, no break in period, very comfortable! First day I wore them we played in a monsoon, and my feet stayed dry the ENTIRE round. Great buy! They look great too!
customer_reviews.author: ballermom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Super padded and comfortable - the achilles area is the best - it's soft and very padded. I find most golf shoes dig into my achilles, these are fantastic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied.  Hard to find black golf shoes to compliment women but these are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of black golf shoes that weren’t too masculine. I got size 8.5 and they fit great. Love the gold stitching and spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The design is okay, decent price but a little water for inside the shoe when first use. Great for a wet day so you don't slide in the grass
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Very comfy. I haven’t walked the golf course yet, only walked around the house for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe box! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide toe box. Waterproof for early morning golf rounds! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: CTGolfer

customer_reviews.title: between the crappy shoe laces and the general feel of these was ...
customer_reviews.text: Even if these had fit properly, between the crappy shoe laces and the general feel of these was enough for me to return these.
customer_reviews.author: KhouriTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. unfortunately did not work for me , — returned with no problem. Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Pizza2008

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable shoe I have ever owned! I am usually a size 9-91/2, but needed a size 8 1/2. Good looking black shoe, great for winter and wet conditions. Shoe is made very well! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd side decoration
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t look closely enough, what I thought were breathing holes along the sides are actually little metal Studs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Feet were dry in the dew and these are so cushy and light! I need them in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are used for cutting grass on hills...I don't slip or slide anymore...So happy to have them....They are extremely comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these right out of the box walking 18 holes of golf. They were very comfortable with a lot of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Txgolf

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and waterproof!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are AWESOME!!!!! I just got them and I golfed today. Our course was a swamp and my feet were dry as a bone. Very comfortable too!!! Nicely padded inside. I ordered the grey/yellow. They are sharp!!! And so affordable at $39.99! Highly recommend. I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wallack

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Since it has no air holes, these will be my winter shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Soft inside comfortable and the spikes are excellent. I ordered 8.5 I usually wear 9 the 8.5 was a little large but still fit good
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Gold accents :(
customer_reviews.text: Narrow. Uncomfortable. Can’t return after worn. Kind of ugly in person.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn real golf shoes in eges. VERY comfy first time out. They clean up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: yllek

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I wasn’t sure the first time I tried them on, they felt a little stiff and small, but after walking the first hole they formed to my foot great and have been perfect ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth May

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable out of the box. Great style too! Looking for a shoe I can wear on the course when the grass is wet and these will be perfect! Footbed has nice feeling too.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe, very comfy yet sturdy, fit is perfect and stylish at that!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Adidas.. always been my go to shoe. Comfy, sturdy and stylish and fits to size. Buy this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Flower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, if only they could improve my game;)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been great!! I have worn them in the course twice and have to say, they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is pair #3 of this model- 2 black and this one. Extremely comfortable and yet giving. I personally enjoy the grip of the ground provided by spikes - so this shoe is a win - for me,
customer_reviews.author: GolferLady

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my purchase. In fact, might consider ordering same shoe in different color if available.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great. Light comfortable to walk in. Sizing was exact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Runs narrow. Not sure will work...wearing in house to see if will stretch out
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure about these. I played 18 holes and found them very comfortable. They have a memory foam cushion. Really nice
customer_reviews.author: Tricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Will not order this brand of shoes again
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for them at all. They did not fit true to size and color was not really the color that was represented. Only wore them once. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Deby Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great as well as comfort (and looks great too)!
customer_reviews.author: FBL322

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fits comfortably!! The price is great. I highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pribyl

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes but run slightly large
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes but run slightly large. I’m normally 6.5 but had to order a 6 instead and return the 6.5
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, walked 9 holes in them out of the box with no issue. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Grass cutting
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for cutting grass because of my hillside and they work great
customer_reviews.author: John Simons

product_meta.title: adidas Women's W Adipure Dc Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Spiked golf shoe incorporates a redesigned adipure women's last featuring a more rounded toe, wider forefoot, and lower ceiling height for improved aesthetics and increased comfort.
feature_bullets: Microfiber climaproof leather for lightweight comfort and durability
3-Stripes feature extruded metal rivets for added sheen and a rich premium look
Cloud foam insole provides everlasting cushioning, support and comfort
6-Spike configuration with thintech low-profile technology and adiwear rubber for improved traction and stability
Low profile thintech EXP cleat offers improved stability, traction, durability, and green friendliness
